entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 21.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
